website_summaries.verdict: One of the loudest sets of hi-hats focused on producing the dynamics and volume required for rock songs.
pros: Hi-hat cymbals offer a brighter sound compared to other 14-inch hi-hat options
Pedal work is pleasing to the ear without requiring a lot of effort to produce high volume
cons: Sound quality is more appropriate for student and beginning players instead of professional settings

customer_reviews.title: How well it sounded
customer_reviews.text: This was a very well made cymbal! It sounded amazing! Even my band mates noticed! Bravo! Seasoned Drummer Here of 23 years
customer_reviews.author: Tesha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this hi hat. It is a huge upgrade from my old Sabian SBR. I really like the way it sounds. I give it 4 stars because obviously there are better hi hats out there. But for the price, this is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ZBT 13” HHs - Great Sound  and Value!
customer_reviews.text: ZBTs are typically characterized as beginner cymbals but the 13” HHs have a bright sound that has a crisp “click.” While they may not be recording session quality, they’ll more than meet the needs of learners and new gig drummers. They’ll also pair well with the ZBT 16” crash and 20” ride (much better than the 18” crash/ride!). Great value and great sound!
customer_reviews.author: msaffers

customer_reviews.title: absolutely awesome! these cymbals sound great
customer_reviews.text: absolutely awesome! these cymbals sound great. i am just a novice player but I can easily tell you what a great sound my hi hat has now.
customer_reviews.author: richard Gee

customer_reviews.title: amazing sound for a low price
customer_reviews.text: are these the cheapest? no, but they are the lowest priced hi hat's i have sampled with the best sound. are they the best sounding, perhaps not but very decent at a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L. Pellon

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for 15 y/o dedicated drummer. Good bang fir the buck He’s happy with them
customer_reviews.author: kristin kohn

customer_reviews.title: ZBT 13" HATS
customer_reviews.text: My name is RObert, I play Deathcore/Melodeath/Blackdeath. Been playing 6 years. Bought these recently(ish), and I'm pretty satisfied. Of course, when I was buying these guys, I knew these were not the A's I play on on my school's kit, but i still love the sound and quality Zildjian put into these, especially for the price. I mean, dont expect audio gold, but expect something cheaper than pro-models. And yes, if in a toss up between these and the meinl's you can pick up for 15-20 less, just go with these. The meinls are good, but these are better.
customer_reviews.author: skeletor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertized and quickly shipped to my Puerto Rican box address.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweat sizzle
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sounding cymbals I have ever owned. The price is the best part. You can't touch this kind of quality for such a low price for new Zilgunes.
customer_reviews.author: David Dutka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Finally a pair if affordable hi-hats I love the sound of!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Perry

customer_reviews.title: hi hats
customer_reviews.text: clean, clear sound. not two pie plates coming together. They are quality stuff, buy them, do not buy other brads other than zildgian.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. West

customer_reviews.title: Cymbal Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Took a long time to ship but arrived on the target date. Got exactly what I had hoped for. Great!
customer_reviews.author: Commander G-Bo

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price. The sound is pretty nice, but could be better. Don't let that discourage you though, these are great budget cymbals!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Potts

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This was donated to the church worship team. I have not received an feedback yet because they have to purchase special stands for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: sgoood
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Now give me credits for commentary.
customer_reviews.author: Randy hill

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound. Legit company.
customer_reviews.text: Sound great. I wasn't expecting much for just a little over 100 bucks. I was surprised. These are totally usable. I see no reason to not use them for recording. They are very crisp. Maybe a little thicker than some might like. Drummers I've played with have had thinner hi hats. That said, these are good. I've heard way worse from cheap hi hats.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Computer Nerd Musician Guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It works beautifully well. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Foster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the sound quality; have always loved Zildjian
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: 13 inch zildjian hi hats
customer_reviews.text: great little pack....these were packed very nicely in a plastic bag and taped then smothered in bubble wrap the way they should be.... they might be the cheaper line of Zildjians but they are still very nice and are Zildjians....they came on time and in great condition.... sound nice, love them ...great job Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Charles F. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Since im a beginner, i liked these alot. They sure can take a beating too. I've had them for 5 months and i bought them used and they are still in alright condition. Im getting z custom dyno beat hihats to replace them but i like them still i am still going to use them. Also, compared to Sabian b8 14 hats, i liked the ZBTs better. So if your a beginner on a budget, these are the hi-hats for you. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Diane K

customer_reviews.title: tough hats
customer_reviews.text: i have had these hihats about a year and there are no defects. one thing i dont like about them is that they dont have a really tight chick. they are a little bit loose but that could be the stand i have. you should definitely buy these hats if your on a tight budget.
customer_reviews.author: William Steinbach

customer_reviews.title: Zildjian in name but...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set of these cymbals recently and after having them for only 2 months I am already looking to upgrade. If you take care of your cymbals then just spend a little more and get something with a better sound. Depending on how you play, cymbals can last your whole career or the life of your hobby so don't skimp and buy these just because of the cheap price. If you want quality you need to be willing to pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fotiu

customer_reviews.title: Spend more to get a better sound
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine gave me a pair of these cymbals because he was cleaning out his house. The sound is so bad on these things it is embarrassing. They are definitely an entry level cymbal but they sound like two garbage can lids being smashed together. I have played with Zildjain hi-hats my whole life and love them but you need to be willing to spend more to get a good sound. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: gib

product_meta.title: Zildjian ZBT 14" Hi Hat Cymbals Pair
product_meta.description:
Size:14"Begin finding your unique voice with Zildjian. Delivering a quality bright and cutting sound, ZBT cymbals are designed to allow the student drummer maximum expression at the right price. Zbt is the perfect set for studying and performing any style of music on the drum set, in the school concert band or marching band. 

zildjian ZBT 14" Hi-hat cymbals pair features:


✅ great-sounding 14" Hihats
✅ B8 alloy uses 92% copper and 8% tin
✅ higher pitched than cast bronze cymbals>✅ focused overtones and fast decay
✅ developed in the Zildjian sound lab

get your Zildjian ZBT 14" Hi Hat cymbals pair. Add to cart now!.
feature_bullets: 🎶 beginner’s choice: The perfect cymbal set for beginners and student drummers. Sharp and focused. Excellent, bright "chick" Sound
🎶 top notch quality: Zildjian ZBT non-cast cymbals are shaped, hammered, and lathed to exacting specifications. Learn and explore all styles – pop, rock, jazz and more – with ZBT

🎶 sharp and focused: Zildjian non-cast cymbals have a higher pitch than their Cast bronze counterparts and produce a consistent sound. A bright, high-pitched sound that cuts through easily in all playing situations
🎶 Great value: The ZBT line is a great introduction to the Zildjian family of cymbals. Make serious music at a great value for your money
🎶 Zildjian cymbal set Warranty: Zildjian cymbals carry a 2-year warranty against manufacturing flaws (purchased new). all Zildjian cymbals are made in the USA
